alert.note: Alert for Dooly; Macon; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 29 at 3:43AM EDT until April 01 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Alabama... Chattahoochee River at 14th Street at Columbus affecting Lee, Muscogee, Chattahoochee and Russell Counties. Flint River at US 19 near Carsonville affecting Taylor, Crawford, Upson and Talbot Counties. Flint River at GA 26 near Montezuma affecting Sumter, Macon and Dooly Counties. Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Twiggs, Houston, Bibb, Monroe and Jones Counties. Flint River near Thomaston affecting Upson and Talbot Counties. Echeconnee Creek at Houston Road near Byron affecting Houston, Crawford, Peach and Bibb Counties. Ogeechee River at GA 88 near Grange affecting Jefferson and Washington Counties. Oconee River at Avant Mine near Oconee affecting Wilkinson and Washington Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville affecting Bleckley and Pulaski Counties. Oconee River at Dublin affecting Laurens, Wilkinson, Johnson and Washington Counties. For the Chattahoochee River Basin...including Helen, Dahlonega, Cornelia, Buford, Buford, Suwanee, Suwanee, Chattahoochee River upstream McGinnis Ferry Rd, Norcross, Roswell, Chattahoochee River above Roswell, Powers Ferry & I285 Atlanta, Smyrna, Chattahoochee River below Morgan Falls Dam, Atlanta, Atlanta, Atlanta, Atlanta, Fairburn, Whitesburg, Fairplay, Whitesburg, Whitesburg, Franklin, Corinth, Hammett Rd below Hogansville, Franklin, West Point, Columbus, Union, Omaha...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Flint River Basin...including Lovejoy, Peachtree City, Fayetteville, Americus, Peachtree City, Woolsey, Sharpsburg, Peachtree City, Peachtree City, Senoia, Griffin, Griffin, Orchard Hill, Molena, Thomaston, Carsonville, Montezuma, Byromville... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Griffin, Juliette, Juliette, Dames Ferry, Macon, Macon, Hawkinsville, Byron, Clinchfield, Hawkinsville, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Oconee River Basin...including Penfield, Milledgeville, Oconee, Oconee, McIntyre, Irwinton, Oconee, Dublin, Mount Vernon... Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River at GA 26 near Montezuma. * WHEN...From late tonight to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23 feet, Minor flooding continues in the woodlands and extensive flood plain along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 26. The access road to Georges Boat Landing will be flooded at least 3 feet deep. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 23.2 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 20 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
